text:
Hello Anchal! Tum teenon drams wali kya ek sa sochti ho! Sabne mujhe seedha aur simple bol diya! ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜… 
Waise mujhe tum mujhse zyada seedhi lagti ho and baat krne mein kaafi mast ! All set aside, it was great knowing you and waise toh mujhe ladkiyon se baat krne mein thodi jhijhak si rehti thi but tum teenon ke saath kabhi woh feel nhi huağŸ™‚ğŸ™‚. ECO221A mein yaar waise quizzes mein toh mera khud chhut jata tha but endsem mein dekho maine btaya tha kaayde se!ğŸ˜’ğŸ˜’ Aakhir mein hum dono ka same hi raha dekhoğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”. 

Tumhara naam bhi waise ekdum fit baithta hai chuhiya kyunki tum humesha ekdum excited, kudti hui aur smile krti rehti ho! Aisi hi rehna! Aage ke liye best of luck! You'll do great!  ğŸ˜„ ğŸ˜„
author: Yatin  Azad

text: Han Mr. Senator bohut expectations rkhta hun mai apne wing walon se kya kiya jaye. Memoir toh mai expect kr rha tha but khud bhi memoirs likhne padenge yeh nhi socha tha. ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ . 2 hafte hogye hain, friendly reminder nahane ke liye. Tera bed pe pura let ke padhna toh ab humare alawa 2-3 Lakh logon ko aur yaad rhega! Saath mein teri woh smile jo aati thi tab tereko pata tha ki tu kuch alag bolne wala hai! Baki Antaragni ka tereko pass toh dil wa dunga, but bhao toh koi tereko bhi nahi degi ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†. Cisco apka intezar kar rhi with open arms toh best of luck uske liye and contact mein rehna ! ğŸ¤™ğŸ¤™
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
One of the toughest memoirs I'd have to write will be for my brother.

One of the best wing repi, any wing could ever get. Pure wing ka common link tha Nareda. Koi bhi dikkat ho, ya kuch bhi bakchodi krni ho Nareda ke paas jane ka mann krta tha. Humari wing ka Ambani bnne ke liye Thanks, Tu na hota toh kitne get-togethers shayad ho hi nhi pati. Humari senator debate toh yaad hi hogi, jismein eventually hum dono ne apply nhi kiya and end mein senator bne Sharma ji ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. 2nd year aur first year summers toh humne practically pure time saath bitayi hai. Abhi bhi yaad hai mujhe  saath baithke world cup ke matches dekhna, swimming, raat bhar patte khelna aur subah MT jake breakfast krna. ğŸ˜‡ğŸ˜‡

Isliye itna bura bhi laga tha mujhe jab tu jaldi nikal gya. 2 din tak toh mai room se nikla bhi nhi :(:(. Ek advice agar mai dena chahun toh woh yhi hogi ki khud ko kisi bhi friendship/relationship mein itna mat invest krna ki saamne wala reciprocate hi na kar paye. (Baki Mario wala gift abhi bhi pending hai ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›!)

Jaldi se UPSC nikal lena mere aspirant par Abhilash ki tarah mujhe bhul mat jana. Thank you for being such a pleasant part of my life at IITK. One that I'll always cherish and dher saara Good luck aage ke liye bhi.ğŸ˜‡ğŸ˜‡

Ab kuch lines mere favourite gaane se-:

It's been a long day without you, my friend
And I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
We've come a long way from where we began
Oh, I'll tell you all about it when I see you again.

ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Wing ke sabse FIT dikhne wale logon mein se ek ğŸ’ªğŸ’ª and Taekwondo mein LOKI ke partner! Mujhe yaad hai abhi bhi tu hi tha woh jisne Nareda aur mera First year mein faceoff rakhwaya tha. Uss Faceoff ka end result yeh raha ki hum dono Senator ke liye khade nhi huye ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Bhai tu Pure IITK mein woh pehla insaan hoga jisne mere baare mein aisa socha tha ğŸ¤¯ğŸ¤¯. Mai kaafi surprised tha padh kar! Waise Bandi mai pata bhi lunga tab bhi mai Antargni mein dress up hoke hi niklunga ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜› kyunki mai aisa hi hun. 
Tum bhi mast fatafat UPSC nikal lunga fir mujhe Mazze kro bolne ki zarurat nhi padhegi. Aur yeh election ke liye debate krane wala skill toh IAS bnke bhi kaam aayega ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†

Yo Apoorva!
Mai theek tum kaisi ho?ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†

Apoorva urf Animesh ki Behan dono interchangeable words ban gye the. Humari wing Animesh ko dundhti rehti thi aur Animesh ka dhyan saara apni behnon par ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. But tumhare saath baat krne mein koi jhijhak nhi rehti thi kabhi, kaafi comfotable lagta tha sab. Waise GH se zyada time tumne apne hall mein bitaya hai ğŸ¤£. Abhi thoda time campus mein aur ho, ummed hai MTH bohut pasand aayega tumhe. Best of luck ! Zarurat padegi shaayad ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›. Fir mast si job bhi lagwa lena xD
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
It's very rare Priyal but sometimes, some people begin to matter to you so much more than you ever thought they would.,,,

Ab I don't know what place I had in your IIT K journey. Maybe I was one of the supporting characters, maybe just a cameo appearance, or maybe even the righteous sidekick who always says "Yeh kro", "Yeh mat kro" and everyone in the audience just wants to say, "Bhaiya ab toh bas krdo"ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…. But it was really satisfying to watch you open up, slowly gaining confidence in yourself and the people around you. ğŸ¤—ğŸ¤—And then finally carving your own place and identity by just trying really freaking hard. ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ“ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ“

Probably the biggest reason why I could do well in all those BSBE courses was those multiple reruns I had of the content because I wanted to be able to help everyone else. And that happy feeling I had when I was able to answer someone's doubt and explain a topic well, I'm gonna miss that the most. The feeling, that I had already begun to lose towards the end of my third year....ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…

"Yatinnnn Prof banjaa", hearing this from you countless times did reassure me when I was confused whether or not I should continue with an academic career. (Truth be told though, I still am, albeit a little less.)  
Now I'm not gonna go on about all our interactions because I'm sure you know I remember all of them like a picture. I don't know if you realized this but me getting all sparkly and happy about Pokemon and Cricket was actually pretty similar to how happy and impromptu Drunk Priyal is.... That's probably because both of us feel our reassured, confident selves then!  ğŸ¥´ğŸ¥´

Good Luck Priyal! I know you'll do well as long as you believe in yourself! And on the days you don't, you can count on the people close to you to remind you why you should!
I'll try my best to hold on to that promise and photo for as long as I can.....ğŸ™‚ğŸ™‚
author: Yatin  Azad

text: Hello Rajat bro! You've always been such a nice, sweet and helpful person and I'll always remember you that way! 2nd-3rd year mein woh A101 ke Gulla sessions humesha yaad rhenge and Final year pe chhat pe kri bakchodiyan bhi! Mujhe reality check dene ke liye bhi Thanks, I guess ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£. "Tum jitna ho utna hi bana kro" bhia private mein bol dete uss din sabke samne hi uda di ğŸ™ğŸ™. Mazze kro dost aur aise hi hasste rehna! Take care bhai!
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Mera neighbour aur dher sari ladaiyon mein partner Shrotriya. Bhai first year mein toh mai maha chaapu smjhta tha, par second-year aur third-year tak aate aate tum chudaap zyada krne lage the ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Patte, Mafia, Monopoly mein toh humari fixed attendance rehti thi. Mafia mein toh kya hi andhi marte the tum ğŸ˜‚. Par tum mera vishwas krlete the bas utna tha, kyunki hum dono ko mafia banne ko milta hi nhi tha ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”. Woh wala game abhi bhi yaad hai jismein tumhare MTH wale dost ne hagg diya tha warna hum jeet rhe the. 

 Last month na mil pane ka mujhe khudko regret sbse zyada hai par coincidence yeh tha ki jis din nikalne ka mail aaya uss din bhi apan dehla pakad khel rhe the. First year mein jab aaye the toh tum thoda reserved,shy types the, par end tak aate toh kya chilate the bhai tum ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Teen roomm chhodke bhi awaz aa jati thi. Hall ke cult secy(jabardasti ki post thi waise) bnke tumne Galaxy toh mast krwadi par end mein ELS ke event ke liye tumhe mai hi milta tha ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…. Ab dusron ka toh pta nhi par tujhe toh khila hi deta tha, ab andha paisa aajayega toh tum khila dena ğŸ™ƒğŸ™ƒ. Youngest IITian hai bhai tu humari wing ka, chaapu aaya tha aur chaapke hi jaa rha hai. Tere saath rehna mere liye khatarnaak bhi tha (___Zindabad, sariya) aur mazzedaar bhi. Best of luck tumhe bhi, dher sara cash kamao aur hume na bhul jana. Abhi bohut treats baki hain ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Jis Din Deepak tu LKO gya tha ussi din soch liya tha maine mai tere memoir mein kya likhunga! Maine ab tak TV series mein hi dekha hai ki show ka main hero ekdum seedha sadha and uska best friend ek number ka harami ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ but ekdum pakka dost. Meri life ki story mein woh harami tu tha. Sala sab kuch hi kr leta tha tu. ğŸ˜µğŸ˜µ Bakchodi krne mein toh number 1 tha hi tu but padhai aur Ph.D nikalne mein hi utna hi chapa tune. Tere mazak kabhi kabhi gussa toh dila dete the par mazza bhi utna hi aata tha ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…. Aur jitna khul ke tu bol pata tha sach kahun toh mera bhi mann krta tha ki kisi din mai bhi itna khul ke bol paun, 
Ph.D ke time yaad ayegi yaar BSBE walon ki aur sabse zyada tab jab Prof bekar padha rhe honge aur koi unki lene wala nhi hoga ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”. America jake Bandiya ghuma rha hoga toh idhar bhi thoda apna Asshirvad barsate rehna accha lgega hum bhi. Baki Department ka Rank 1 toh tu hi raha but Nobel Prize mai pehle nikalunga dekh lena ğŸ˜ğŸ˜. Jaisa hai waise hi rehna. Awwal darje ka harami aur utna hi awwal darje ka dost....
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Mera favourite barista Deepanshu Katare! Bhai Ghar aane ke baad bohut beaten coffee pi, tab bhi tera wala flavor nhi aa paya. Wing ke sabse active logon mein se ek. Wing ka koi bhi event ho toh usmein chief guest tu hi tha. Kisi bhi situation mein logon ko entertain rkhna, yeh tera hi ek unique talent tha. Mast mast mimicry karna, daaru partyyyy, and kabhi bhi canteen ya mess akele na jana! Kitni baar hum gaye hain Hall 1 aur Hall 4 tiwary ki chai peene ğŸ¤˜ ğŸ¤˜ and woh bohut miss krunga mai. 

Ab tune notice toh kiya hoge ki itne logon se mila tu fir bhi sabpe apni chaap chhod gya. Itna special hai tu sabke liyeğŸ˜ƒğŸ˜ƒ. Ab yeh vlog wala Buzinezz tumhe next reunion tak tujhe continue rkhna hai. Fir mai bhi bolunga acha katare tu jaa rha hai? Itna jaldi jaa rha hai?  Chall theek hai bhai milte rhenge ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚.

PS-: I hope we get to meet at least ek baar campus mein. Nahi ho paya toh bahar mil lenge ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›!Best of luck dost!

text:
First year se mere dimag mein humesha ek hi sawal rha hai. 
"Kaise krlete ho yaar JD tum?"
Phy102 ke doubts hain toh JD se puch lo.
Basketball player chahiye JD se puch lo.
Baddy player chahiye JD se puch lo.
Dance mein hall ko jitana hai JD se puch lo.
Patte khelne hai JD se puch lo.

One of the first people I've met who tries everything and still manages to be amazing at every one of them. Someone you can truly depend on. It was a pleasure knowing you JD and the more I got to know you, the more I was left in awe of you :). I hope in the future you find something that can truly challenge you!
author: Yatin  Azad

text:

Wing ki sare get-togethers, UCL ke sare matches, aur baddy and phatta ke sare games mein full attendance deke, exam wali raat 12:30 so jana and agle din paper chaapke aajana. Just a normal day in the office for Karan. 

Kaafi time saath spend kiya, kaafi time aur spend krna tha but CKMKB. Next wali trip pe pakka saath mein jayenge. IITK get together toh chlta rhega. Wahan pe I can learn all your newly acquired flirting skills. 

All the best bolta magar JP morgan hai, mujhe pata hai acha hi hoga bc ! TAJ Hotel mein booking rkhna bas!

text:
Loki mere bhai, tera aur mera first year kaisa ek sa beeta tha. Hum dono ke palle kuch padhta nhi tha aur dono ne hi TG ko bhagwan maan liya tha ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Abhi bhi yaad hai ki apne sare bhiayon mein mere hi Phy102 mein sabse kam the ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£. 2nd-3rd year mein apna constant interaction chalte rehta tha, tu aata tha mujhse puchne koi mast movie/tv series btaun(Abhi bhi puchta hai). Sach bolun toh apne saare bhaiyon mein ek tu hi tha jisne mere kabhi mazze nhi liye. Dhanyawad apka ğŸ˜…. Aur maine jitne bhi random shows suggest kre, tune eventually sab ko ek baar try toh kiya(Aur end ein pasand bhi kiye xD). 

Mai agar Tommy hun toh tu mera Arhur hai. 
"First a few words from the heart. My brother helped me survive through some of the worst times." 
Yeh wala dialogue yaad aajata hai mujhe!

Loki ko dekhke ek calm si feeling aati thi, tujhse araam se kuchbhi share kr skta tha mai. Hn woh ek baar angry young man wala loki bhi dekha tha jab woh photo daal di thi tushank ne ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…. Tu contact mein rehna Loki mai naye shows dekhke rkhunga tere liye! Aur dher saara best of luck, jo bhi karna, jaisa bhi krna, wahi krna jismein tera dil lage ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„. Aur haan play mein teri acting mast thi bhai ekdum <3 aur tu likhta bhi mast hai!

text:
Salam Hall 2 ke maalik aur humare manniye President Sahab,

Woh tumhari fb pe cover pic jo hai, woh badi saralta se dikha deti hai tumhara hall pe ke raj ko.

Baki Hall walon ka toh pta nhi but humare liye best President toh tum hi the. Wing ke kuch logon ne milkar hall 2 ki galaxy utarwadi aur kya chahiye. Patte ar monopoly khelne mein itna mazza aane lag gya tha ki ab toh kabhi trip pe jane ko bhi mila toh ek din pura yahi krenge apan.

Badminton ke backhand ki itni practice krayi thi tumhe itna jaldi bhul gye tum toh ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”. MSO, DS, CSO kisi mein tumhe smjh aa jaye aisa kuch smjha hi nhi pata tha mai ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†. Acha hai ab koi courses saath nhi apne.ğŸ˜¢ğŸ˜¢

text:

text: Hello Bhai! Humare BSBE lab group mein ek tu aur mai hi toh the jo sara kaam krte the toh thoda credit toh tujhe bhi lena padega. author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Memoirs are tough Bhai! But it becomes extra thought when you have to write one for someone you've lived with, for a year and a half. ğŸ™ğŸ™

Sabhi wing walon ko good listener bna diya yaar Priyanshu tune ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚, first year mein courses ke RR ko leke ğŸ˜….Idhar hum pass hone ka try kr rahe the air udhar tujhe A ki cutoff se 5 number an upar hone ki ğŸ˜‚.Thoda sa RR toh tu second-third year mein bhi krta tha but utna chlta hai . 
Honestly Bhai, I've seen the growth you've gone through across the 4 years I've known you. From someone constantly needing support and assurance to becoming someone who can actually take care of himself and others. Living alone and handling every situation so responsibly.  Game nights and wing bakchodi mein tujhe miss toh kaafi kiya.  And even though tu room ki band bajake rkhta tha ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ but I also liked ki exams khatam hone par tu room ko ek baar set krne ka zarur try krta tha ğŸ˜…. 

I know that everyone's life has its highs and lows, but I wish from now on you get to enjoy your highs without worrying about the lows. But in case you feel the need to discuss your apprehensions with someone, remember that I'll be there always to lend you an ear. And I know thoda cliche hai but life updates dete rehna because this is one journey I wouldn't want to miss out!

And bhai abse thoda khud pe confidence rkhna. Kya matlab mera A* aa rha hai fir bhi mai A ke liye dukhi nhi ho skta ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”. Mat hona abse, maar khayega ğŸ˜ ğŸ˜ . 

PS-: Waise classes ke time tujhe room ke bahar lock krne ke liye sorry ğŸ˜.  
PPS-: Pehli salary se Five star hotel mein treat chahiye mujhe.
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Hey bro! Today's finally the day I write your memoir! Toh ek Cheese burst pizza zarur bhijwa dena ghar pe ğŸ¤£. I think across these four years, you are one of the people who's changed so much. I suppose you yourself and the people around you would agree to that! But to me personally, I've always seen you as this confident and interactive person who's forever eager to know people and keep the social circle together and brimming with activity.  And this is one quality that has probably stayed with you until today. Although, I will admit you can be borderline rude and rather annoying kabhi kabhi but I guess that's the Delhiite in you that takes over ğŸ˜›. I do believe that your efforts and help can go under the radar sometimes, so a cumulative Thank you for that! ğŸ˜… 

I hope you keep persevering, keep running, and kudos to what you've already achieved so far and lots more to come.  And please, for God's sake, decide on a career choice, will you? Now, I won't say the customary stay in touch remark because I'm certain we will!ğŸ¤˜

text:
YO BSBEEEEEE! Aise hi bolta tha na tu mujhe humesha? ğŸ˜‚ Fatafat achchi baatein cover kr leta hun uske baad tumhari bakchodiyan bhi ginwani hai. Toh sabse pehle toh mera personal zomato bnne ke liye Thanks, na jane kitni baar tumne mujhe khilaya hai canteen mein, chowpatty mein and home delivery bhi! And tumhare dancing skills toh ekdum mazzedaar theğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹! Par bhai kabhi bhi so jana and bina chaddar bichaye so jana aur naak se woh ajeeb si awazein nikalna ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Hum logon toh handle kr liya par R ko thoda ajeeb lag skta hai ğŸ¤ğŸ¤ğŸ¤.

Mujhe kaafi acha laga tha waise uss din jab tumne bulake mujhe gifts dikhaye the. Kyunki aise it makes you realise that you are a part of the other person's life. Ek fact jo shayad waise kisi aur ne point nhi kiya hoga and woh hai tumhara gadget ka collection. Baap re! Ek do idhar bhi bhijwa do ab toh tum 1 percenter ho gye. ğŸ˜ğŸ˜ . Aur tumhare Tv series niptane ke skills se toh mai aaj bhi surprised rehta hun. 8-9 season wale shows bhi tum toh hafte mein nipta dete the  ğŸ¥´ğŸ¥´.

Wing ke OG Bihari boy ko dher sara best of luck! Agar logon ke saath bhi review system hota toh tumhe pure 4.5/5 deta mai. 0.5 minus for cleanliness ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†. Stay connected buddy humesha! 

PS-: Pics bhej dena ab yaad se âœŒï¸âœŒï¸
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Hi Somu! Most of this post would be a big Thank you from me to you, so pehle hi heads up! Sach kahun toh during the initial phase of my college I had no idea how I would survive here. First sem toh bura gya hi tha and second sem mein bhi kuch smjh nhi aa rha tha. Uss samay mera inspiration to tha! jitna shiddat se tu TA ka kaam krta tha and jitne dedication se tu padhta tha, it made me realise that If I wanted to achieve something, I'll have to work hard for it! But what was even more admirable was the way you always stuck by your principles right until the end. Final kuch samay ke liye bhi tu college nhi aaya, iske liye dher sari gaaliyan dene ka mann toh kiya; but thoda sa dil main relief bhi tha kyunki chaar saal baad bhi Somu remained the Somu we all knew and loved. 

Iss baar maaf toh krdiya hai but next time koi excuses nhi challenge :P . Bade officer ban jao fir ek mast trip pe challenge! Tab take ke liye dher sara Good Luck! And Thank you for always being an ever dependable friend and such an amazing human being. Lots of love to you, keep in touch :)
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Hello Campus ki Serena Williams! No Thanks for beating me in Inferno, my wingies still manage to bring that up in any discussion around me! And also Thanks for always hyping up my running abilities cuz even though I sucked at Tennis I was happy that there was at least one thing I could compete in with you guys. I still have that book you gave me which I NEVER got to return. I swear I have been carrying it around ever since 1st year summers and it just skips my mind to give it back! Had a great Summers with everyone and I hope you continue to do well in Tennis and life in general ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„.
PS-: Just a reminder that it's totally fine to give someone a box of Gujjiyas and I'll request you keep doing that xD
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Aur btao Tushank kaise ho? Almost last day hogya and mai tera memoir ab likhne jaa rha hun! But honestly reason yeh nhi hai ki mujhe yaad nhi rha, reason yeh hai ki kabhi kabhi smjh nhi aata ki jiske saath aap first year se end tak saath rhe ho uske saath bnayi dher saari memories ko kuch lines mein kaise capture krun.ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…

Sabse pehle to Thank you! Maine socha nhi tha ki Kanpur mein bhi acchi jagah milengi but jitni bhi thi, tune woh sari mujhe ghumayiğŸ˜ğŸ˜. Uss din scooty pe jab Tu, Mai aur Sahil gaye the tab shi mein bohut mazza aaya tha.( Tu jab chla rha tha toh thoda darr bhi laga and meri chappal bhi gir gyi thi sadak peğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†). 

And Diwali ke time ghar se dur ghar ki feel dilwane ke liye dil se shukriya. Itna badhiya khana aur mast patakhon wala kaand yhi baatein toh baad mein yaad aayengi. Han next time patakhon ko charakdi se dur rkhenge ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›.
And sabse mast baat yeh rehti thi ki iss sab mein hum sabse zyada excited bhi tu hi rehta tha. I really miss that ever excited, happy Tushank a lot, pata nhi kahan kho gya......ğŸ™ğŸ™. 

Meri badhiya badhiya photos lene ke liye, hazaron topics pe gyaan baatne ke liye, dher saari outings plan krne ke liye aur table ko chhodke bed pe padhne ke liye bhi dil se shukriya. You've always been this giver, who just gives and gives without expecting anything in return and just the kindest, most interesting person I have ever metğŸ˜‡ğŸ˜‡. If there was one small piece of advice that I could give you, I hope that you can set aside a relationship that has caused you so much hurt; and move on to someone who can match the energy and efforts you put into a relationship. Because the next time I get to see you, I want my old Tushy back!!ğŸ˜’ğŸ˜’

Good Luck for the next chapter in your life bhai, khub paisa kamana and duniya ki sabse sweet, caring and hot bandi patana! And saath saath uski best friend se meri baat bhi chlwa dena xDğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†. Mai abhi aa rha hun Kanpur toh milte rhenge apan, shaayd kuch aur locations mil jayein ghumne ke liye .
PS-: Woh raat ke 2 baje wali bakchodi, Outreach Audi aur FB buildng ki chhat pe dobara krengeğŸ˜‰ğŸ˜‰
Take care and Stay Happy, forever and always!
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Han bro hum logon ko ab pata hai. Ki BSBE gang ka sabse talented banda tu hi hai. Cool Dude 69## naam hi kaafi hai ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†. 3rd year mein kya mast trio bana tha hum logon ka, kehne ko exams chal rhe the but sabse zyada mazze bhi maine tabhi kiye. TA201 toh yaad hi hoga, best project tha apna ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›. Fir dheere dheere jab third year end hua toh mai hi bacha trio mein akelağŸ˜’ğŸ˜’. 

Mast magai krke pokemon ke episodes dekhne mein kya hi mazza aata tha ğŸ˜‡ğŸ˜‡. Par BC tune promise kiya tha dance sikhayega, ab hopefully mai toh campus mein hi hun toh aate rhunga milne. Tu bhi fatafat job lagwale fir trip pe bhi jana hai(Stud bnne ke tips and tricks bhi sikhane hai tujhe mujhe.)  Online humari chhoti moti ho jati hai ladai, but offline its always fun with you and I know it'll remain that way! Best of luck bhai, machate rehna humesha, naachte rehna humesha ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚!
author: Yatin  Azad

text: Also , please apne awkward experiences share krte rehna. With guys as well as with gals, kyunki tu dono mein utna hi popular hai ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†!
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Kya Vipul mere liye memoir nhi likha tune? ğŸ™ğŸ™. Koi nahi mai toh likhunga. Sweet, Innocent and bohut hi zyada helpful yeh teen qualities hain jo Vipul ke baare mein socho toh sabse pehle dimag mein aati hain.ğŸ˜‡ğŸ˜‡ Jab bhi dekho laptop pe kuch na kuch dekh rha hota tha. Par ek movie zarur tune achchi recommend kri thi mujhe woh Geeta Govindham ğŸ‘ŒğŸ‘Œ. Uske liye Thanks.
Tereko humesha maine ek smile ke saath dekha hai toh woh smile maintain krke rkhna. Aur yogi ko apni bandi se dur rkhna hai tujhe, udhar bohut danger hai ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£. Apni body building mast continue rkhna aur iss baar padhai bhi. Fatafat graduate hoke, place hoja fir dher sara paneer khayenge ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹.
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Aur Vishesh, apne Bhaiyon mein lagta apan dono hi hain jo ek saal aur saath rhenge ğŸ˜… ğŸ˜…. Ek mahina extra hota agar aap apna slot acche se chunte. ğŸ™ƒğŸ™ƒAb yeh bhi nhi pata ki iss saal college jane ko bhi milega ya nhi isliye yhi sab likh deta hun.

Sabse pehle toh kya dushmani hai bhai tumhari humari branch se ? Tumne sab branches mein apna haath mar liya, humari wali reh gyi bas. Dual major BSBE mein krna tha, kaafi scope hai ğŸ¤£. 
Hum dono ke kaafi common interests rhe hain RCB, King Kohli and Abki baar.... sarkar. Aur teenon ne hi hume kya disappoint kiya hai. ğŸ˜”ğŸ˜”

Isliye sabse zyada gaaliyan bhi ab hum hi log dete hain unhe. Badminton mein humari partnership badhiya thi bhai, sirf tu hi tha jiske saath mai nhi haarta tha ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£.(Although tere liye shaayad woh partnership utni sahi na ho kyunki zyada mehnta krni padti thi tereko xD). Kaafi miss kiya tujhe iss baar court mein, JD ka koi competitor hi nhi tha! 

Even though tu chill thoda kam hi marta hai but I'm happy ki jab bhi hum phatta, volley ya baddy ke liye nikalte the, you were always there. Aur jo tera yeh angry young man hone ke karan woh jhagde ğŸ˜ğŸ˜.

4(3) saal mein itna confidence toh aagya tha ki VK hai bada chaapu! Mai Virat Kohli ki baat kr rha hun saale(Ab yeh mat bolna gaali kisko diya bey). Waise tujhe bhi zarurat toh nhi hai luck ki but fir bhi Best of Luck for your future endeavours. It was a pleasure meeting you and I hope I can continue meeting you! Humari family mein sabse zyada toh tune hi machaya hai but fir bhi agar kabhi bhi zarurat lage toh I'll be there for you humeshağŸ˜„ğŸ˜„
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Namaskaram Yash bro ! Kaisa hai? Bhai KGMU toh mera pehla paid holiday tha bhai shi mein kya mast tha apan ka. Abhi lag rha hai woh Urology department ke chakkar lgane se acha ek do aur game khel lene the apan ne xD. Bhai hum waise aiveyein hi mazze le rhe the itni bhi buri nhi thi woh "oka" wali ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜†. Anyways, games aur khana peena toh I guess sabko yaad hai but mujhe woh humari return drive sabse mast lagi thi. Hum log mast gossip krte huye, aur gaate huye wapas aaye the kaafi mast mehfil jam gyi thi car mein ğŸ˜„ğŸ˜„. Bhai woh mai shuru se itna humble hun isliye zameen se juda hi rehta hun mai ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚.

Ab I know that everyone promises and hopes ki we get to meet again but mai aisa kuch promise nhi krunga. Apan ke paas mast memories which will probably last a long time and agar kismat mein hoga toh we'll surely get to meet each other again. Tab tak ke liye best of luck bade sahab!
author: Yatin  Azad

text:
Yogi Man! Mai yeh memoir likh rha hun iss ummed mein ki tere woh 21 din khatm nhi huye hain, taki tu yeh memoir padh paye. Baki sab side pe rkhke sabse pehle-: Nashe chhod de mere bhai ğŸ˜…ğŸ˜…. First year mein aaye the tab tu hi ek experienced banda tha aur end tak aate toh bhai tune sabko try karwa diya ğŸ˜†ğŸ˜†. But ek jo sabse acchi baat lagi tujhmein woh yeh thi ki tu kabhi bhi kuch khaa, pee raha ho tu sabse pehle dusron ko include krne ka try krta tha. Jaise mai room mein ghuson tu bolta tha "Aja baithja khaale." 
Bhai gaming laptop toh le liya tune, uspe game koi bhi nhi kheli tune ajtak ğŸ¤£ğŸ¤£ aur kharab pehle karwa diya. 
Aur tumhara paper wali raat NCL jake CID, Savdhan India dekhna toh pure campus mein famous hai ğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜‚. Bhai mai toh keh rha hun abhi bhi Cricket Sir se summer camp ka refund mangle, kyunki fatta toh tu pehle jaisa khelta tha, camp ke baad bhi waise hi khelta tha ğŸ˜›ğŸ˜›. Bhai dil ka ekdum mast hai tu bas Nashe aur CID chhod de, sab shi ho jayega. Thoda toh fefdon ko bachana hai na nhi toh aage jake kaise khelnge apan? Take care bhai ğŸ˜„
author: Yatin  Azad
